title: illaiyE vElanaippOl
sahitya:
illaiyE vElanaippOl irakkam uruvAr evarum


anupallavi

  ellaiyillAdaruLai aLLiyE aLittu allalurum anbarai Adarittu varuvOr


caraNam    kanru tan tAyat-tEDi kadariyODuvadu pOl tannai nADum aDiyArai annai pOl aNaiyavE
kunru tOrumE ninru kumbiDuvOriDam anbu koNDiDum bAla daNDAyudanaip-pOla
